Classes

class  DzFormula
 Implements a formula in RPN that can use properties as inputs. DzFormula provides a an implementation that evaluates mathematical formulas in RPN (Reverse Polish Notation). In RPN, operators follow their arguments and all operations are evaluated from left to right immediately when they are encountered. This notation enables very complex formulas to be represented without parentheses or braces to specify the order of operations. Below are a few examples of traditional (infix notation) formulas and their RPN representations: More...

 Property controller that evaulates formulas to drive the output value. DzFormulaController maintains lists of formulas that are evaluated to set the. More...
